alert.note: Alert for Garland; Montgomery; Perry; Polk; Saline; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 5:27PM CDT until April 15 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PERRY...NORTHWESTERN GARLAND...EAST CENTRAL POLK... NORTHWESTERN SALINE...SOUTH CENTRAL YELL AND NORTHERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 527 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Plainview in Yell County to 9 miles east of Muddy Creek WMA to near Oden, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Oden... Mauldin... Avant... Chula... Gibbs... Pencil Bluff... Crystal Springs Landing... Mt Tabor... Fannie... Lena Landing Rec Area... Pine Ridge... Silver... Hollis... Onyx... Fourche Mountain Recreation Are... Sims... Crystal Springs... Story... Hurricane Grove... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Little Rock.

area.areaDesc: Garland; Montgomery; Perry; Polk; Saline; Yell
